ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: Line-spacing, double enter copy/paste output
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior When I copy/paste from - chatgpt to an issue I have this weird formatting issue that I can not resolve by highlighting the text again and selecting /text or /code. I have to manually backspace and then hit enter again to remove the weird line-spacing. ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/19786399/a4fd0eb6-0834-4600-9f62-bcfbea8a032e) ### Steps to reproduce 1: Ask chatgpt for a markdown file directory 2: copy - paste to issue ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/19786399/b03a993d-5c01-4779-a2d3-cc4a3b01f3e2) ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Local
